name: Villain Hides His True Colors
summary:
What does it mean to live when it’s so painful?
A young boy thought about it for days and days, but he couldn’t think of an answer.
To him, every day was like a nightmare…
Until one day, when the answer came to him.
Bang–!
[ Level has risen. ]
This is a story of a villain who hid his true colors and vowed to become a hero.

Type: Web Novel (KR)
author: 당신의5분
